characteristics.name: Strength
characteristics.description: Determines physical power and the ability to use certain weapons.

characteristics.name: Intelligence
characteristics.description: Affects the ability to cast spells and solve puzzles.

characteristics.name: Charisma
characteristics.description: Impacts interactions with NPCs and persuasion attempts.

characteristics.name: Endurance
characteristics.description: Determines stamina and resistance to damage.

additionalRules: Characters with higher intelligence can learn more spells.
Dexterity affects the success rate of dodging attacks.
Charisma influences the likelihood of NPCs providing assistance.
